sentences.english: Then in both places the rise of nongovernmental organizations gives us real hope.
sentences.chinese: 在貧富國家中都出現了非政府組織，這帶給我們希望。

sentences.english: Macau is affluent but not for all people.
sentences.chinese: 澳門是富裕的城市，但貧富懸殊嚴重。

sentences.english: This policy exacerbates the gap between rich and poor.
sentences.chinese: 這項政策加劇了貧富差距。

sentences.english: Pelotas is a South Brazilian city of marked economic contrasts.
sentences.chinese: 佩洛塔斯是巴西南部一個以貧富差距而知名的城市。

sentences.english: They raucously complain about China's growing gap between rich and poor and its "bubble" economy.
sentences.chinese: 他們粗聲抱怨中國的貧富兩極分化和“泡沫”經濟。

sentences.english: Only by realize common prosperity and gradually narrow the gap between rich and poor can we achieve harmony.
sentences.chinese: 只有逐步縮小貧富差距，實現共同富裕才談得上和諧。

sentences.english: The gap between rich and poor has widened because of the bad economy in the past few years.
sentences.chinese: 過去幾年經濟轉壞，貧富懸殊進一步拉闊。

sentences.english: In every country, rich or poor, the story is the same.
sentences.chinese: 在每個國家，無論其貧富程度，情況都一樣。

sentences.english: Protesters are raising questions about the rich-poor divide and miscarriage of justice.
sentences.chinese: 抗議者提出了貧富分化和審判不公等問題。

sentences.english: The gap between the rich and the poor and the status of the social harmony and stability show a negative inter-relationship.
sentences.chinese: 貧富差距的程度與社會和諧穩定狀況呈負相關關係。

sentences.english: He also promised to punish corruption and address China’s growing wealth gap.
sentences.chinese: 他同時保證會懲治腐敗並承認日益增長的貧富差距。

sentences.english: But this surely needs some justification.
sentences.chinese: 但這樣的貧富差距肯定需要一些存在的理由。

sentences.english: The polarization is referred to as the class splitting up based on the expansion of the gap between rich and poor .
sentences.chinese: 兩極分化是建立在貧富差距拉大基礎上的階級分化。

sentences.english: In third world countries the gap between the rich and the poor is very big.
sentences.chinese: 中國城市教會的一大問題是貧富懸殊及其產生的張力。

sentences.english: Increasing prices can help narrow the wealth gap," he said.
sentences.chinese: 其價格的上漲有助縮小貧富差距，”他表示說。

sentences.english: The greatest divide of rich-poor is in China.
sentences.chinese: 中國的貧富差距是最爲明顯的。

definition: noble and lowly/high versus low social hierarchy of ruler to people, father to son, husband to wife in Confucianism
